author: Ross Mcdonagh For Dailymail.Com
title: Bella Thorne shares photo fail during Caribbean cruise | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share The teen also rocked some red and blue false braid extensions and plenty of glitter make-up to finish her vacation-ready look. The Blended star is currently enjoying en enviable island hopping trip around the Gulf of Mexico, courtesy of Celebrity Cruises. First: The route was the same one taken at Christmas by Demi Lovato, who even performed a concert on the tiny island of Sint Maarten The route was the same one taken at Christmas by Demi Lovato, who even performed a concert on the tiny island of Sint Maarten. Earlier Bella gave an up-close tour of her fantastic figure via Snapchat, sharing the camera with a bevy of her equally attractive friends. The friends danced, twerked and even strip-teased to a somewhat eclectic mix of music ranging from Ariana Grande to Migos to Blink 182 and everything in between.
